text: Shannon Tweed (born March 10, 1957) is a Canadian actress and model. She acts mostly in erotic thriller movies. In Detroit Rock City, she played Amanda Finch. Tweed was born in St. John's, Newfoundland. ==References== Category:1957 births Category:Living people Category:Canadian models Category:Canadian movie actors Category:Canadian television actors Category:People from Newfoundland and Labrador Category:St. John's, Newfoundland and Labrador
title: Shannon Tweed
